ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I hear on Gone, its lvls much more so than resist gear.  At least that is what I have heard from the one guild on my server that takes the time to
ygData.messageBody:
From what I hear on Gone, its lvls much more so than resist gear. At least
that is what I have heard from the one guild on my server that takes the
time to kill her every now and then. I have heard a lot of people complain
about her poor loot table, and on my server the only thing anyone wants from
her is the Book/scale.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 9:02 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?


Leadership means nothing when the people there don't listen to commands.
Maybe Veeshan is the exception in this case, but I have seen the leader of
one of our most powerful guilds fail on a Vox run due to complete
incompetence of the people there. If people had at all been able to follow
directions, I wouldn't be sitting around with my thumb up my butt waiting
for my guild to get enough resist gear to down Gone. (I have pretty much
everything else done). Bitter?

Elfson Allegro 55 Veeshan
